947820.name: Distance - Soundtrack & Art Book
947820.description:
The Distance Original Soundtrack (Vol. 1 & 2) features music by Jordan Hemenway & The Quiggles! 60 tracks in both MP3 (320kbps) and FLAC formats. Includes over 2.5 hours of original music from Distance with extended cuts and a few bonus tracks, all remastered exclusively for this release.

Also includes the Digital Art Book which showcases the evolution of Distance's art direction throughout its 6 year development (55 page PDF).

*Music from Distance v1.1: The Nexus Update added Sept. 2019
947820.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
